intro.label: Intro
intro.name: Md. Tanjil
intro.tagline: Software Engineer,  Bridging design and function for seamless UX.

about.label: About Me
about.value: I'm Tanjil, a passionate Software Engineer, specializing in frontend development with expertise in React.js, Next.js, React Native, and Expo. With a keen eye for design and a strong grasp of performance optimization. I build seamless, pixel-perfect, and interactive user experience. I am always open to feedback and eager to learn.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable full-stack applications using Next.js, React Native, Expo, Python, and Django.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs ensuring secure authentication and optimized database performance.
Led the frontend development process, focusing on pixel-perfect UI, smooth user interactions, and performance optimization.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes and prototypes into fully functional applications.
Integrated third-party APIs, payment gateways, and cloud services to enhance application functionality and scalability.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, Vercel, and EAS for automated deployments and OTA updates.
Conducted code reviews, mentored junior developers, and ensured best practices in clean architecture and modular coding.
Worked in an Agile environment, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospective meetings.
Led frontend and backend integration efforts, troubleshooting and resolving performance bottlenecks.
Managed project timelines, ensuring seamless collaboration between frontend, backend, and DevOps teams.
Contributed to hiring processes, interviewing and onboarding new developers for the frontend and full-stack teams.

values.title: Back to Back 3 time team of the month
